rule: Each description must neglect artistic insight and provide imprecise imagery for the AI-generated photo.
output: A quaint, weathered cottage sits atop a sandy dune, its wooden exterior painted a soft pastel blue with white trim. Waves gently crash against the shore, reflecting the warm glow of a late afternoon sun. In the background, a vast ocean stretches to the horizon under a pastel sky dotted with wispy clouds. The scene evokes a feeling of tranquility and nostalgia, inviting viewers to escape to this serene coastal retreat.
